```{r, setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath(".."))

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```

# Load data
```{r}
load("data/cpce.RData")
```

# Analyze
```{r}
df <- ddt2 %>%
  group_by(reef, dir, channel, site, date, transect) %>%
  summarise(meanSA = mean(SA)) %>%
  ungroup()


ggplot(df, aes(x = date, y = meanSA, color = channel)) +
  facet_wrap(dir ~ reef) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()

ggplot(df, aes(x = date, y = meanSA, color = channel)) +
  facet_wrap(~ site) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)
```
